properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
U.S. VIRGIN ISLANDS.
DNC 14, DNC 16.
1. 48 FOOT S/V BRISEIS, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS
   ON BOARD, OVERDUE ST CROIX (17-44N 064-44W)
   TO ST JOHN (18-20N 064-44W). VESSELS IN VICINITY
   REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF
   POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO RCC MIAMI,
   PHONE: 305 415 6800, E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2998/17.
